mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(om.APPL_NO, lmm.APPL_NO) as 'APPL_NO', lti.LECT_YMD AS 'LECT_YMD', lti.SBJCT_MTHD_CD AS 'SBJCT_MTHD_CD', IFNULL(oli.ON_LECT_NM, 'ZOOM 수업') AS 'ON_LECT_NM', IFNULL(oli.ON_LECT_URL, lmi.JOIN_URL) AS 'LECT_URL', IFNULL(om.LECT_PRGRS_RT, 0) AS 'LECT_PRGRS_RT', IFNULL(lmm.ATTEND_STATUS, '결석') AS 'ATTENDANCE' FROM LECT_TM_INFO lti LEFT JOIN ON_LECT_INFO oli ON lti.LECT_YMD = oli.LECT_YMD LEFT JOIN LECT_MEET_INFO lmi ON lti.LECT_YMD = lmi.LECT_YMD LEFT JOIN ON_LECT_MAG om ON lti.SBJCT_NO = om.SBJCT_NO AND lti.LECT_YMD = om.LECT_YMD AND om.APPL_NO = #{appl_no } LEFT JOIN LECT_MEET_MAG lmm ON lti.LECT_YMD = lmm.LECT_YMD AND lmm.APPL_NO = #{appl_no } WHERE lti.SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no } ORDER BY lti.LECT_YMD ASC
